item.title: Finally I Cracked the Code
item.description:
Finally I wrote in Russian right Well, I finally did it.
This is my greatest accomplishment of 2016
But I think wins come in all sizes — big wins and small. I feel good about my writing. It took me over a year to get good. I don’t really care how many people made fun of me for my writing (trust me, I know how horrible they look).

item.title: About
item.description:
“I’ll help your business build powerful software, unstoppable conversion, and unbeatable success.” Hi, my name is Kasem. Senior software consultant with over 15 years of experience. I help specialized, successful software and SaaS companies create high-quality mobile apps with expertise-driven software consulting.
2016 - Producing new educational material.
Have questions? send me a private message.

item.title: Code Encapsulation in iOS With Swift
item.description: One of the places where most iOS developers make object oriented design mistakes is putting all UI code inside view controllers. This will lead to an unmanageable and massive view controller. Thus, this clearly violates the MVC pattern guideline. Let’s be real. You found your way here because you have an interest to know how to make your view controller cleaner and separate concerns and responsibilities.

item.title: An UNBEATABLE Guarantee
item.description: I start every business relationship with my 7-Day Unbeatable 100% Money-Back Guarantee. Try my software consulting service for a full 7-days, 100% risk-free. If you don’t LOVE it, I insist that you get 100% of your money back. I’ll even eat the credit-card processing fees. In short: You will get your money back and keep all the work completed as my gift to you.
